label: SearchIndexerError
description: Represents an item- or document-level indexing error.

fields.label: Key
fields.tooltip: The key of the item for which indexing failed.

fields.label: Error Message
fields.tooltip: The message describing the error that occurred while processing the item.

fields.label: Status Code
fields.tooltip: The status code indicating why the indexing operation failed (e.g., 400, 404, 409, 422, 503).

fields.label: Name
fields.tooltip: The name of the source at which the error originated (e.g., a particular skill).

fields.label: Details
fields.tooltip: Additional, verbose details about the error to assist in debugging the indexer.

fields.label: Documentation Link
fields.tooltip: A link to a troubleshooting guide for these classes of errors.
